description:
Natsumi and Keroro wind up switching bodies. But while Keroro is initially delighted with how powerful Natsumi`s body is, they both soon discover that the other`s got it rougher than they think.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Keroro, Subsitution of Shirts / Natsumi Turns into a Magical Girl
Tournez et permutez ! / Si je pouvais devenir magicienne
ケロロ ガシャッとまわせばいれかわり であります / 夏美 魔法少女になれたら... であります
